task_descriptions:
Come up with your own scenario!

About you:
- Your name: `CustomerName@plane`

 The AI Assistant can handle:
- Search for a flight (e.g. from `City-1@plane` to `City-2@plane`)
- Book a flight (e.g. with id `id@plane`)
- Checking the weather forecast in different Cities (e.g. `City-1@weather` or `City-2@plane`)
linear_guide: Use your imagination to generate a conversation about the topics 'finding a flight from `City-1@plane` to `City-2@plane`' and 'reserving a flight' (in any order), as shown on the left. You may also ask the assistant about the weather.
Please have some smalltalk with the AI Assistant at some point in this dialogue.
If you haven't yet, it's time to change topic. You can also go back and forth between topics.
If it makes sense, use some negations ('I don't want X', or 'anything but Y', etc.)
Keep going until you've covered all the topics ('finding a flight' and 'booking a flight'). The conversation should continue at least until the last instruction is given.
Ok, once you've touched on all the topics ('finding a flight' and 'booking a flight') and engaged in some smalltalk, you can bring the conversation to a natural close.

Wizard.task_description: Follow the flow charts and help the user.
